params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the arc's center.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the arc's center.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The angle at which the arc starts in radians, measured from the positive x-axis.

params.name: endAngle
params.description: The angle at which the arc ends in radians, measured from the positive x-axis.

params.name: counterclockwise
params.description: If true, draws the arc counter-clockwise between the start and end angles.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the first control point.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the first control point.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the second control point.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the second control point.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to attach.

params.name: startX
params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: startY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.name: middleX
params.description: The X coordinate of the mid point.

params.name: middleY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the mid point.

params.name: endX
params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: endY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to trim.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to delete.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to download.

params.name: path
params.description: The download path. (file name and extension)

params.name: path
params.description: Path or url to the image.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the image.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the image.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the elliptical arc.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the elliptical arc.

params.name: rotation
params.description: The rotation of the ellipse, expressed in radians.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse starts, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.

params.name: endAngle
params.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse ends, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.

params.name: counterclockwise
params.description: If true, draws the ellipse counterclockwise (anticlockwise).

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas name to draw rect on.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the fill style in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the fill style in.

params.name: multiline
params.description: Indicates if the text should be drawn in multiple lines if it exceeds the maximum width.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to use filters in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the line dash in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to get the pixels from.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: src
params.description: Path or url to the image.

params.name: property
params.description: The image size property to return.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the letter spacing in.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the line's end point.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the line's end point.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to measure text in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to begin a new path in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to create.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The angle at which to begin the gradient, in radians. The angle starts from a line going horizontally right from the center, and proceeds clockwise.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the center of the gradient.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the center of the gradient.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the start circle.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start circle.

params.name: r1
params.description: The radius of the start circle.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the end circle.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end circle.

params.name: r2
params.description: The radius of the end circle.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to get or set the opacity in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to place the pixels in.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate at which to place the pixel colors in the canvas.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate at which to place the pixel colors in the canvas.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of the rectangle to be painted.

params.name: height
params.description: Height of the rectangle to be painted.

params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: startY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: endY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to resize.

params.name: x
params.description: Scaling factor in the horizontal direction. A value of 1 results in no horizontal scaling.

params.name: y
params.description: Scaling factor in the vertical direction. A value of 1 results in no vertical scaling.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the line dash in.

params.name: segments
params.description: An array of numbers that specify distances to alternately draw a line and a gap (in coordinate space units).

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the shadow in.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the transformation in.

params.name: a
params.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: b
params.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: c
params.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: d
params.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: e
params.description: The cell in the first row and third column of the matrix.

params.name: f
params.description: The cell in the second row and third column of the matrix.

params.description: The canvas name to draw rect on.

params.name: multiline
params.description: Indicates if the text should be drawn in multiple lines if it exceeds the maximum width.

params.description: Name of the canvas to set the text baseline in.

params.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

params.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

params.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

params.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to add a translation transformation in.

params.name: x
params.description: Distance to move in the horizontal direction. positive = right, negative = left.

params.name: y
params.description: Distance to move in the vertical direction. positive = right, negative = left.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the word spacing in.

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount of frames to extract.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the GIF to create.

params.name: delay
params.description: Number of milliseconds to display frame

params.name: frames
params.description: Number of frames per second to display.
